ItemBGDesc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the weapon you and {TEXTJOIN#59} managed to forge. You can tell at a glance that this {TEXTJOIN#61}, emitting an aura of pure danger, is no ordinary item.\nIt's actually a toy laser gun belonging to Mr. Xiyan's little niece. He forcibly got the toy off her to use it as a prop, and she didn't talk to him for three days. (He returned the toy laser gun to her later and apologized sincerely.)
